properties.title: DavMail POP/IMAP/SMTP/Caldav/Carddav/LDAP Exchange Gateway - OSX Address Book setup
properties.author: Mickael Guessant

section.name: OSX Address Book setup
section.p: Launch OSX Address Book and create a new Carddav directory.
Enter your credentials and localhost:1080 as server location to sync with the default personal address book.
